heroSection.tagline: Organizing for a democratic socialist Delaware since 2021
heroSection.description: We're building a movement to challenge corporate control of Delaware's economy and politics. Together, we're fighting for housing justice, international solidarity, immigrant rights, and a Delaware that puts people before profits.

missionSection.heading: Our Mission
paragraphs: Delaware DSA is building a democratic-socialist movement where production and resources are controlled by the people, not private profit. We reject the capitalist economic order, systemic oppression, and violence that characterizes our society.

We're committed to a 'New Delaware Way' rooted in equitable wealth, gender and racial justice, and freedom from poverty and exploitation. Our chapter welcomes plural left tendencies, supports independent mass organizations, and stands firmly against imperialism.

strategicPrioritiesSection.heading: Chapter Priorities for 2025
strategicPrioritiesSection.subtitle: At our 2025 Convention, our members democratically adopted these four priorities to guide our organizing work in Delaware:

priorities.title: Defending Communities from ICE
priorities.description: Working alongside migrants' rights organizations to protect communities from ICE authoritarianism and create sanctuary policies throughout the state.

priorities.title: Delaware Against Apartheid
priorities.description: Building coalitions to decrease economic support for the state of Israel through targeted campaigns like 'No Appetite 4 Apartheid' and establishing apartheid-free zones.

priorities.title: Housing Justice & Rent Stabilization
priorities.description: Fighting for tenant protections, promoting affordable housing policies, and organizing renters through our H.O.M.E.S. Campaign.

priorities.title: Making Delaware a Trans Refuge State
priorities.description: Working to transform Delaware from a state that 'doesn't persecute' to one that actively supports and protects transgender people through model legislation.

getInvolvedSection.heading: GET INVOLVED
getInvolvedSection.subheading: Join us in building socialist power across Delaware

committees.title: Housing Justice Working Group
committees.description: Advocate for tenant rights and campaign for affordable housing policies across Delaware.

committees.title: International Solidarity Working Group
committees.description: Organize global solidarity actions and build anti-imperialist alliances worldwide.

committees.title: Migrant Rights Working Group
committees.description: Build support networks and resources to uphold the rights of migrants and refugees.

committees.title: Queer-Socialists Working Group
committees.description: Amplify LGBTQ+ voices and integrate queer perspectives within our socialist campaigns.

committees.title: Membership Engagement Committee
committees.description: Focus on member onboarding, retention, and creating meaningful opportunities for involvement.

committees.title: Communications Committee
committees.description: Handle chapter messaging, newsletter production, and manage social media presence.

committees.title: Red Rabbits Committee
committees.description: Provide safety and security coordination for chapter actions, events, and demonstrations.

committees.title: Socialists-in-Office Committee
committees.description: Manage electoral work, candidate relations, and strategic political engagement.

committees.title: Political Education Committee
committees.description: Organize educational events, reading groups, and develop resources for member development.

committees.title: Mutual Aid Working Group
committees.description: Organize community support networks and direct aid initiatives to meet immediate needs.

committees.title: Legislation Tracking Working Group
committees.description: Monitor and report on Delaware legislative activity and policy developments.

committees.title: Arts-and-Culture Working Group
committees.description: Integrate creative approaches to organizing and develop artistic expressions of socialist values.

latestUpdatesSection.heading: LATEST FROM THE DELAWARE ROSE GARDEN
latestUpdatesSection.subtitle: News and updates from our chapter

joinCTASection.heading: JOIN THE MOVEMENT
joinCTASection.description: The corporate interests controlling Delaware aren't giving up power without a fight. We need you to help build a democratic socialist alternative that works for all Delawareans, not just the wealthy few. Whether you have years of organizing experience or this is your first step into activism, there's a place for you in Delaware DSA.
